New Comp/Circular‐2010 
Restricted  
NO.CAS-7(9)/2008/DIV.I(Weapon) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated : 16 /12 /2010 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO. 23 /2010 
 
 
Subject:-  Permission for Carriage of Arms & Ammunition by the   
                 General Manager, Rifle  Factory, Ishapore. 
 
 
 
 
A copy of DGCA permit  number 911-AA/2010, issued under 
reference  No.8/98/2005-IR dated 24.11.2010 regarding authorization to the 
General Manager, Rifle Factory, Ishapore for carriage of arms & ammunition, 
consigned to the licensed dealers and Central / State Govt. Departments, by air 
within the territory of India, is forwarded herewith for information and 
necessary action by all concerned.  
 
2. 
Unless suspended or revoked earlier, this permit shall remain valid 
w.e.f  01.01.2011 to 31.12.2011.  
 
3. 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA).  
 
Encl:    As above.  
 
 
 
 
 ( R.N.Dhoke, IPS )  
Addl.Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution as per list attached.
